definitions.body: ), (Aram. [[כַּתַּר]] Pa., wait, hope for; katar Pa. wait, await, remain: i.e. perh. surrounded expectantly, v. Job 36:2 infr.)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[כִּתְּרוּ]] Ju Jdg 20:43 of surrounding an enemy; sf. [[כִּתְּרוּנִי]] Ps 22:13 (in fig.; ‖[[סְבָבוּנִי]]); Imv. [[כַּתַּר־לִי]] Job 36:2 wait, I pray (as in Aram.)
